thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good food, Beautiful spacious bedroom, nice neighbour
thread.title_full: Good food, Beautiful spacious bedroom, nice neighbour - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: LaurisMoli
title: Good food, Beautiful spacious bedroom, nice neighbour
text: i really liked this hotel, the location was great, we had to drive to san francisco but it was just a 15 mint ride, the bedroom was spacious enough for 4 adults, the hotel was really beautiful and modern, we enjoyed the gym and the breakfast was delicious but it wasn't included, the parking was free and the restaurant staff was so nice and even gave us travel tips.
